body:
Hey guys! I made a sax cover for the Smash 4 theme song!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L4SbKA55BCk

And bs sorry it's not amazing...

a. I used my iPod to record it.
b. This is using a soprano sax while my main sax is alto.

UPDATE:
I changed the link from a mobile device link to a desktop link

replies.body: A pretty agreeable performance, in my opinion. I'm no saxophonist — I only play violin, piano, and guitar — but I think the tonal clarity of your sixteenth-note pickups could benefit from some improvement more than anything else. That aside, your sense of time wavered throughout; I discerned both dragging near the middle and rushing around the end of the video. For a casual cover without a background track, however, that's probably inevitable. Nonetheless, your musicianship is evident.
replies.body_tagged: A pretty agreeable performance, in my opinion. For a casual cover without a background track, however, that's probably inevitable. Nonetheless, your musicianship is evident.

replies.body: I know what you are talking about with the sixteenth notes, it's actually the horn. It's like one of those cheap Chinese brands so it has trouble with the lower ranges.
